name: The Mansion (itch) (EPDempsey, theonejanine)
description:
Set in the Victorian era, the game revolves around two time periods; past and present. Chaos and neglect rampages in the present time while the past reveals a new and untouched version of the mansion. The player must complete puzzles that span between the two timelines to unlock a mysterious door.

The Mansion is a short university project made back in 2019 to explore methods to create an interesting experience using limited areas.

Features:
  • Two visually different and handcrafted areas
  • Three unique mechanics
Contributing members:
  • Ethan Dempsey
  • Janine Ibali
Special Thanks:
  • Griffith University Staff
